gemini_ocr_schema.OCR_TAX_ID_NUM: 사업자등록번호 (Business Registration Number, e.g., 123-45-67890). This is the unique tax identification number for the business.
gemini_ocr_schema.OCR_BP_NAME_LOCAL: 법인명(단체명) (Corporate Name or Organization Name). The official registered name of the company or entity.
gemini_ocr_schema.OCR_REPRE_NAME: 대표자 (Representative Name). The name of the legal representative of the business.
gemini_ocr_schema.OCR_COMP_REG_NUM: 법인등록번호 (Corporate Registration Number, if applicable, e.g., 110111-2309353).
gemini_ocr_schema.OCR_FULL_ADDR_LOCAL: 사업장소재지 (Business Address). The full physical address of the business location.
gemini_ocr_schema.OCR_BIZ_TYPE: 업태 (Type of Business - Category). The general category of the business (e.g., 도매 및 소매업 - Wholesale and Retail Trade).
gemini_ocr_schema.OCR_INDUSTRY_TYPE: 종목 (Type of Business - Item). The specific item or service the business deals with (e.g., 전자상거래 소매업 - E-commerce retail).

gemini_ocr_schema.OCR_BP_NAME_LOCAL: Legal Name. The official legal name of the business.
